description: For sale: $1,299,888. DO NOT DISTURB TENANTS. A great opportunity for investors in the desirable Santa Clara neighborhood located close to schools, walking-distance to park, bike trails and high tech companies. Featuring four units that are 2 bedrooms and 1 bath. Property features laundry, one carport assign space and one side space per unit.  Open house on Thursday 7/23 from 2-3PM.  Only able to view unit #2, #3 & #4.
title: Santa Clara Home For Sale
